bibl.title: Hawara Portrait Mummy No. 4.
bibl.note: Cf. W.M.F. Petrie, Roman Portraits and Memphis (IV) (London, 1911), Catalogue, pl. XXVI. - La pièce, que l'on croyait perdue, est conservée au Seabury-Western Theological Seminary, Evanston, Illinois.
bibl.seg: Corcoran Schwabe Lorelei, Hawara Portrait Mummy No. 4.

Cf. W.M.F. Petrie, Roman Portraits and Memphis (IV) (London, 1911), Catalogue, pl. XXVI. - La pièce, que l'on croyait perdue, est conservée au Seabury-Western Theological Seminary, Evanston, Illinois.
